thread.title: Kerry Seeks an End to Israel Violence in Meeting with Abbas
thread.title_full: Kerry Seeks an End to Israel Violence in Meeting with Abbas - WSJ

author: Jay Solomon
title: Kerry Seeks an End to Israel Violence in Meeting with Abbas
text:
AMMAN, Jordanâ€”U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry met with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Saturday in an attempt to quell the violence that has engulfed Israel and the West Bank over the past month and sparked fears of a broader Palestinian uprising.
Mr. Kerry brought to Jordan a set of ideas that he discussed with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin in Berlin on Thursday that are aimed at calming the conflict. U.S. officials said... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
